product_name: Patagonia Baby Synchilla Vest - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: This Baby Synchilla Vest for girls is made of supersoft fleece for exceptional warmth and comfort. Velvety soft Synchilla(R) fleece fabric is quick drying and easy to wash; plus, it scrunches into a backpack with ease; fabric features mostly recycled content. Printed garments are made from standard polyester. Flat seams help eliminate chafing. Tapered stand-up collar; wind flap on zipper. Drop tail provides additional warmth. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia.
short_description: This Baby Synchilla Vest for girls is made of supersoft fleece for exceptional warmth and comfort.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
